title: Platinum,diamond trolls
body:
Im  a platinum 1 player had a decent win rate in plat2 ,but now i got to dia 5 promo and  out of the 5 games i got trolled in 3 games literally inting or griefing  got a janna mid with ghost cleanse  who went mid who were signed as adc . a tilted tryndamere who just runned it down botlane all game no gank etc just went down bot all game. spammed ff button. and now im at 25lp ,and  10 /7 games are at least 1 griefers trolls i keep reporting them  but no message popped up yet  one guy even had  the n word for his clan tag, i think riot needs to do mass bans at this elo or i will quit the game forever .
 Have fun summoners stay in gold never try to get dia its better for your health.
